item.description: Hi! I am a software developer, consultant, computer scientist, and compulsive tinkerer. I’m especially interested in the world of tangible-computation, that is, the use of computers and mathematics to create things that you can see, touch, or hear (smell and taste are a bit trickier). I recently graduated with an M.Sc from the DGP at the University of Toronto advised by Alec Jacobson and David Levin. I'm currently contributing to cutting-edge projects at Tesla. I’ve previously spent several years as a software developer on large-scale projects at Dropbox, Autodesk Research, and LinkedIn.
